House Bill/Resolution NO. HB09173
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REGULATING THE COMMENCEMENT OF CLASS HOURS IN PUBLIC AND PRIVATE EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS IN THE PHILIPPINES
ABSTRACT : "Adjusted Class Hours Act of 2019" Proposes to prohibit any educational institution, public or private, to commence class hours earlier than 8:30 AM; provides for the imposition of appropriate fines and penalties for any violation of this Act.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : GASATAYA, GREG G.
DATE FILED : 2019-03-28
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
